command.carpet-ayaka-addition.killitem.w: Warning: clearing the items in %d seconds
carpet.rule.commandTpt.name: Teleport to players
carpet.rule.commandTpt.desc: Enables /tpt to teleport to another player in your server
carpet.rule.commandGoHome.name: Teleport to spawn point
carpet.rule.commandGoHome.desc: Enables /gohome to teleport right back to your spawn point
carpet.rule.commandWaypoint.name: Global waypoints on server
carpet.rule.commandWaypoint.desc: Enables /waypoint to manipulate and teleport to shared waypoints
carpet.rule.commandC.name: Spectator Switching
carpet.rule.commandC.desc: Enables /c to switch your gamemode between spectator and survival
carpet.rule.commandC.extra.1: Turn it off if you think it's not vanilla
carpet.rule.disableBatSpawning.name: Disable bat spawning
carpet.rule.commandKillItem.name: Clear items
carpet.rule.commandKillItem.desc: Enables /killitem to clear dropped items with one shot
carpet.rule.killItemAwaitSeconds.name: Await seconds for /killitem
carpet.rule.killItemAwaitSeconds.desc: Seconds to wait before killing the items, default to 5
carpet.rule.foxNoPickupItem.name: Disable foxes picking up items
carpet.rule.foxNoPickupItem.desc: Stops foxes from picking up dropped items
carpet.rule.betterOpPlayerNoCheat.name: Better opPlayerNoCheat option
carpet.rule.betterOpPlayerNoCheat.desc: Stops operators from using /kill and /clear, enabled only if Carpet Tis Addition is loaded and opPlayerNoCheat is set to true
